measured_by: Informed subscale of the Decisional Conflict Scale
justification: "These items constitute the informed subscale of the Decisional Conflict Scale [27] and will be averaged into a composite."

measured_by: Engagement items (interest, liking, reliability, trustworthiness ratings)
justification: "Participants will rate how much others would want to read the message; whether the participant is interested in the information; and whether they like how it is presented… Participants will also report how reliable the information is… how trustworthy it is."

measured_by: Three Likert items on effectiveness, safety, and scientific quality
justification: "Baseline attitudes will be measured… Participants will be asked to rate each of three items… on whether they feel it is: effective; safe; based on high-quality science."
